text: How many audio listeners should be present in a Unity scene?
skills: Implement audio in Unity, Produce customized results by correctly configuring audio in a scene

options.text: As many as there are sound producing objects
options.feedback: An audio listener plays any audio sources that are within range in a scene. There is only ever one audio listener, generally on the main camera.
An audio listener plays any audio sources that are within range in a scene. There is only ever one audio listener, generally on the main camera.

options.text: One for each directly interactable object
options.feedback: An audio listener plays any audio sources that are within range in a scene. There is only ever one audio listener, generally on the main camera.
There is only ever one audio listener, generally on the main camera.

feedbackCorrect: There is only ever one audio listener, generally on the main camera.
